Resume

Home / Resume

Hello! We're Aledan audio.

We specialise in all things audio post-production, from dialogue editing and foley to sound design and mixing.
With a combined knowledge of ten years in the industry, we can elevate the sound quality of your projects.

Services
Foley
Modern and mobile-ready website that will help you reach all of your marketing.
Sound design
Music copying, writing, creating, transcription, arranging and services.
Dialogue editing and restoration
Advertising services include television, radio, print, mail, and web apps.
Mix and mastering
Developing memorable and unique mobile android, ios and video games.
